post.body: I am also this way.
I can hear your brilliance. I agree he was misunderstood.
This made me smile thanks for the post. Have you signed him up yet?
Thanks I will give it a read!
I would have loved to have coached him. What do you admire about him the most?
Thanks, I was pleased to find this for myself. I had to share.
No Problem. I think it has value for many.
Hey I'm a newbie. I started yesterday. I also am known to have my KNOB moments. :)
I love you site also. Your page is warm the violets are inviting. Welcome Fellow Coach!
Thanks for that feedback! And the article?
No problem. Thanks for the feedback. What spoke to you?
I'll keep them coming.
Funny the year just started!
LOL Sorry. Thanks for the feedback I agree that should be RT'd. I am new so I had to look "RT" up. :)
Thanks for the info. I will RT in the future I did stumble on it does that still apply?
"Why?" or "Why not?" Which do you find yourself saying most often? http://socialtoo.com/survey/view/760
Einsteinâ€™s 5 Maxims for Creative Excellence. http://tinyurl.com/7yhtec What will you do?
50 "Tools for creating ideas." These are amazing tools. I will use them myself. http://tinyurl.com/lhof2
The 5-3/4 big questions you have been avoiding! http://www.fivebigquestions.com By Box of crayons.
Inner Peace Health check. http://tinyurl.com/8leja8 I guess I have some work to do!
